metadata.synopsis: Plaque presenting a replica of the Blood of Lathander to pilgrims/worshippers. The replica itself is missing, and the plaque and pedestal are all that remain.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Read the fake blood plaque in the monastery

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *The Blood of Lathander. Spilled in holy battle with Sammaster. Immortalised here for all to worship.*
